== Kudlu (CT) (627133) ==

Kudlu (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 10.87 sq. km. and harbouring 5545 households with total population of 26235 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 636 km. Male population is 12682 and female population is 13553. Scheduled Caste population is 1040 and Scheduled Tribes population is 77. Census Location Code of the town is 627133<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 198 km. Railway station is at Kasaragod at a distance of 5 km.
